| HistoryText             = The Press Gang was hired to regularly forcefully take inhabitants from the [[wikipedia:Tent city|tent city]] of [[Down Acres]] for them to be turned into [[Sentinels|Sentinel]] hybrids. When investigating one of those hybrids, [[Max Eisenhardt (Earth-616)|Magneto]] arrived to Down Acres, and after being told what was done to them, he waited for the gang to arrive at night and killed them.{{r|Magneto Vol 3 2}}
